Package rrpss

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AlaCarte
    Stores information about a single alaCarte, particularly used in context of a menu.
    Customer
    Stores the information of all Customer, which includes the membership status, contact, and the reservation made.
    Database
    Stores and retrieves serialized Restaurant object.
    Item
    Stores information about an item of a Menu, AlaCarte and SetPackage
    Menu
    Manages the AlaCarte and SetPackage of the Menu by providing accessor(get methods) of the list of List of alaCarte & setPackage, and individual alaCarte & setPackage, various methods to add new alaCartes/setPackages and remove existing alaCartes/setPackages.
    Order
    Stores all important information of an order created for a customer.
    OrderInvoice  
    OrderInvoiceManager  
    OrderManager
    Stores all Order objects of the whole restaurants and provides ways to creating new Order and getting existing Order object.
    Person
    Stores the name and ID of objects of Staff and of Customer.
    Reservation
    Stores information about a reservation of a Restaurant.
    ReservationManager
    Manages the Reservation of the Restaurant by keeping track of list of reseration and a counter to help ensure the uniqueness of the id of reservation.
    Restaurant
    Represents a restaurant in real life.
    RestaurantApp
    The main application where the RRPSS works.
    RevenueReport
    Prints a restaurant revenue report daily or monthly.
    SetPackage
    Stores information about a single setPackage, particularly used in context of a menu.
    Staff
    Stores the information of all Staff, which includes gender and jobTitle.
    StaffManager
    Manages Staff of Restaurant and keep tracks of the staffs available in this Restaurant with methods to add Staff and remove Staff
    Table
    Stores information about a single table, particularly used in context of a restaurant.
    TableManager
    Manages the Table of the Restaurant by providing getters of the list of tables and individual table, various methods to add new table, remove existing table, and allocate table for an order.
